r.s: A high performance, open source, general RPC framework that puts mobile and HTTP/2 first.
r.d: Remote Procedure Calls (RPCs) provide a useful abstraction for building distributed applications and services. The libraries in this repository provide a concrete implementation of the gRPC protocol, layered over HTTP/2. These libraries enable communication between clients and servers using any combination of the supported languages.
r.n: In addition to 1.4.0RC1 - Fixed pecl windows build issue #11350 - Fixed extension reported version #10842
